text:
="preserve">Zlatko Portner (16 January 1962 – 23 September 2020) was a Yugoslav handball player. He competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics. Portner was born in Ruma. During his successful career he played for RK Metaloplastika and FC Barcelona Handbol.
In 1988 he was part of the Yugoslav team which won the bronze medal. He played in all six matches and scored 31 goals.
Portner died on 23 September 2020, aged 58.
